mapper.select: select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, mcp.pay_date, mcp.start_date, mcp.end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id, m.photo, m.name as member_name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no where cp.coach_no = #{no} and mcp.status REGEXP ('요청대기중|결제대기중')

select mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.remark, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.request_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as request_date, mcp.pay_date, mcp.start_date, mcp.end_date, mcp.star_rate, mcp.review, mcp.review_date, mcp.etc, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id, m.photo, m.name as member_name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email from member_coaching_programs mcp left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no where mcp.member_program_no=#{no}
